participant_2.background:
I'm a busy nurse but I love playing basketball on the weekends.
I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, but I'm ready for a change.
I collect cycling-related items to remember my father by.
My heart is full of love for my family and friends.
My appearance is important to me, because it reflects my professionalism and my dedication to my job.

content.text: Hi there, I'm John. I'm a big sports fan. I watch a lot of sports and love to play sports too.
Hi John, I'm Mary. I'm a nurse and I love to play basketball on the weekends.
Oh, that's cool. I used to play basketball a lot, but I don't have as much time for it anymore. Do you play in a league or anything?
I used to play in a league, but I don't have the time anymore. I play pick-up games at the gym a lot though.
That's awesome. I'm not very good at basketball, but I love playing it.
I'm not very good either, but it's fun to play.
Yeah, it is. So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my family and friends. I also like to collect cycling-related items to remember my father by.
Oh, that's cool. I'm not really into cycling, but I know it's a big deal in the Midwest.
Yeah, it is. My dad was a big cyclist and he passed away a few years ago. I collect cycling-related items to remember him by.
That's really sweet. I'm sorry to hear about your dad.
Thanks. It's been a few years, but I still miss him.
I'm sure you do. He sounds like he was a great guy.
He was. He was the best.
